installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# CSGO Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server
apt -y update
apt install -y --no-install-recommends --no-install-suggests wget lib32gcc1 ca-certificates

mkdir -p /mnt/server/steamcmd
cd /mnt/server/steamcmd
wget -qO- 'https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/client/installer/steamcmd_linux.tar.gz' | tar xzf -

# SteamCMD fails otherwise for some reason, even running as root.
# This is changed at the end of the install process anyways.
chown -R root:root /mnt

export HOME=/mnt/server
./steamcmd.sh +login anonymous +force_install_dir /mnt/server +app_update 740 +quit

mkdir -p /mnt/server/.steam/sdk32
cp -v linux32/steamclient.so ../.steam/sdk32/steamclient.so

mkdir -p /mnt/server/.steam/sdk64
cp -v linux64/steamclient.so ../.steam/sdk64/steamclient.so

function downloadAndExtract {
  branchFiles=$(wget "$1" -q -O -)
  if [ $? -ne 0 ]; then
    echo "Could not get $2 branch files!"
    exit
  fi

  fileName=$(echo "$branchFiles" | egrep -o "$2-[[:digit:]\.]*-git[[:digit:]]*-linux.tar.gz" | sort -V | tail -1)
  
  echo "Downloading $1$fileName..."
  
  wget -qO- "$1$fileName" | tar xzf -
  if [ $? -ne 0 ]; then
    echo "Could not download file!"
  fi
}

cd /mnt/server/csgo

# Get new MetaMod:Source file
downloadAndExtract "http://www.metamodsource.net/mmsdrop/1.10/" "mmsource"

# Get new SourceMod file
downloadAndExtract "http://www.sourcemod.net/smdrop/1.10/" "sourcemod"
